mapper.select:
with id_list as ( select unnest(${unnest}::bigint[]) "id2") select
${ew.SqlSelect} from item_type_link as itl left join id_list on itl.id = id_list.id2
where true
${ew.customSqlSegment} and del_flag = false

with id_list as ( select unnest(${unnest}::bigint[]) "${column}2") select
${ew.SqlSelect} from item_type_link as itl left join id_list on itl.${column} = id_list."${column}2"
where true
${ew.customSqlSegment} and del_flag = false
